name: Space Battle Sandbox
description:
A fun little sandbox where you can fly around a space battle spawning ships for 4 teams. You cannot be killed, and the enemies will randomly target you only sometimes. 

This project was created as a milestone celebration for my stream. It should be treated as a tech demo and has quite a few bugs. It will be worked on again at a much later date.

Controls:
Use 1-4 to change what team the spawned units will fight for. The number of units per tap of the following buttons is 10.
Team 1 will spawn behind your starting location and will behave as friendlies.
Team 2 will spawn to the right, 3 to the left and 4 will spawn dead ahead.
T: Spawn Fighters.
Y: Spawn Bombers.
U: Spawn Cruisers.
I: Spawn Capital ships.

Features:
4 Teams,
5 playable ships - a Fighter (F1), bomber(F2) and 3 capital ships (F3-5)
Large environment.
Automatic turrets, Missile launchers,  4 classes of units.
